about_the_game:
The official artbook for Grandma Badass

This features 30 pages filled with art (including exclusive drawings and pictures) and insights on the game development in French and in English.

IMPORTANT
The PDF will be downloaded to your Grandma Badass Steam folder.
\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Grandma Badass\


You will need to open the game directory and find the "ArtBOOK-Grandma Badass" folder there.
PDF reader or other readers required
detailed_description:
The official artbook for Grandma Badass

This features 30 pages filled with art (including exclusive drawings and pictures) and insights on the game development in French and in English.

short_description: This Artbook invites you to go behind the scenes of the making of Grandma Badass. Design of the characters, the scenery, the cover of the game, the programming etc
